
{{Client function}}
{{New items|3.014|1.4 r6208|
This function gets the density of certain [[/effect.md|effect]].
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
float getEffectDensity ( effect theEffect )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/effect.md|effect]]:getDensity|density|setEffectDensity}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theEffect:''' The [[/effect.md|effect]] to get density of.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
addCommandHandler("ses", 
function (cmd)
   local density = 4
   local x, y, z = getElementPosition (localPlayer)
   local effect = createEffect ("cement", x, y, z)
   setEffectDensity (effect, density)
   getEffectDensity (effect)
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
